long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Send meaningful recognition straight from your toolbar!

Armed with this Chrome add-on, you can send shoutouts quicker than ever.

View the activity feed, send some recognition and even redeem rewards without opening up a new tab.

Nectar is an employee recognition & rewards program that makes it simple to build a culture of collaboration and appreciation in the workplace.
